Question: This person performed 82 concerts in 58 cities to over 4.5 million fans, and grossed a total of $165 million.
Hints: Responding to the gossip, this person remarked to Taraborrelli:.
This person was reported to be one of the largest owners of property on the moon.
In anticipation of this person's 50th birthday, Sony BMG released a series of greatest-hits albums called King of Pop.
